item.title: Mubadala, AXA IM Prime Take Stakes in Private Credit Firm Hayfin
item.description: Mubadala Investment Co. and AXA IM Prime are taking minority stakes in leading European private credit lender Hayfin Capital Management, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.
